main event: On 10th February 1953, an Air Force colonel and several civilians observed unusual aerial objects in Richmond, Virginia.
interesting points: Observation described objects as circular, luminous, and moving rapidly; Sightings reported by four individuals at the Richmond Quartermaster Depot; One witness mentioned the objects traveled at high altitudes and disappeared at a fast speed; Observations took place in clear weather conditions; The investigation concluded the sightings might have been due to a contrail of a jet aircraft.
witness description: civilians and an Air Force colonel working in the Richmond area
